scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle.map
scripts.bundle:ios: mkdir -p ios/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/main/assets/ --sourcemap-output ios/main.jsbundle.map
scripts.release:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && yarn bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.archive:ios: yarn release:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace GalaxyRN.xcworkspace -scheme 'GalaxyRN Release' -configuration Release -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' -archivePath build/GalaxyRN.xcarchive archive | xcpretty || xcodebuild -workspace GalaxyRN.xcworkspace -scheme 'GalaxyRN Release' -configuration Release -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' -archivePath build/GalaxyRN.xcarchive archive
scripts.sentry:android: npx -y dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "GalaxyRN@$npm_package_version" ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle.map && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "GalaxyRN@$npm_package_version" --dist android ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle.map'
scripts.sentry:ios: npx -y dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "GalaxyRN@$npm_package_version" ./ios/main.jsbundle ./ios/main.jsbundle.map && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "GalaxyRN@$npm_package_version" --dist ios ./ios/main.jsbundle ./ios/main.jsbundle.map'
scripts.sentry:upload-dsym: cd ios && npx -y dotenv -e ../.env -- sh -c 'sentry-cli upload-dif --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" build/GalaxyRN.xcarchive/dSYMs'
